meta.website.title.default: Startup investing made simple, for everyone
meta.website.description: Jibrel enables startups and investors to connect in previously unimaginable ways to create capital formation.
RiskDisclosures.title: Risk Disclosures
RiskDisclosures.subtitleAnnotation: While Jibrel’s team diligently and carefully screens all startups, we do not give any investing advice or assume responsibility for your losses. It is your responsibility to pick the companies you believe in. Jibrel does not and cannot recommend or endorse any company or offering.
RiskDisclosures.agreeButton.description: By pressing the I Agree button, you acknowledge that you have read, understood and accept the risks set out above.
NotFound.title: It Looks Like You’re Lost
NotFound.description: This page is missing or you assembled the link incorrectly.
ApplicationPayment.title: Payment for { startupName }
ApplicationPayment.Amount.title: Amount
ApplicationPayment.Methods.card.title: Bank Card
ApplicationPayment.Methods.account.title: Account Balance
ApplicationPayment.Methods.crypto.title: Crypto Deposit
Invest.CustomerData.name: Full Legal Name
Invest.form.amount.title: Subscription Amount
Invest.form.agreement: By clicking <0>Accept and Sign</0>, I understand and agree that this is a legal representation of my handwritten signature/initials.
Invest.form.error: Oops, something went wrong. Please reload the page or try again later.
Invest.risks.description: By pressing the <0>I agree</0> button, you acknowledge that you have read, understood and accept the risks set out above.
Invest.DealTerms.title: Deal Terms
Invest.form.title: Invest in { startupName }
Invest.form.note: To continue, you need to sign the Subscription Agreement by electronic signature. Before you do this, please enter your Subscription Amount
Invested.title: You have Successfully Subscribed
Invested.text: If you want to change the subscription amount or cancel the subscription, please, contact our Support team.
Pending.title: Account Verification Is in Progress
Pending.text: Your verification request is currently under review. We will notify you as soon as verification process is completed.
Portfolio.title: Portfolio
Portfolio.totalInvestedNote: This amount does not include investments with “Verifying” status.
Portfolio.investments.title: Startups
Portfolio.empty.title: Start Investing Right Now!
Portfolio.empty.description: The startups you invested in will be displayed here. The sooner you start investing, the sooner you get a profit.
Portfolio.companies.title: Check More Opportunities
Portfolio.offering.waitlist.notice: Deal is currently closed, join the waitlist to be the first one to know when investments open up.
Portfolio.offering.round.title: Funding Round
Portfolio.offering.goal.title: Round Size
Portfolio.offering.completed.goal.title: Raised
Portfolio.investments.pending.title: Waiting for Payment
Portfolio.investments.pending.descriptio: Wire transfer payments can take from 1 day to 2 weeks.<0/>If you see here a startup that has already been paid, you can upload the payment document and speed up the processing.
Portfolio.investments.hold.title: In Progress
Portfolio.investments.completed.title: Completed
Portfolio.investments.waitlist.title: Waitlist
Portfolio.investments.waitlist.descripti: The list of startups in which you have joined the waitlist. Once the deal is open we will notify you via email.
Unverified.title: Your Account Is Unverified
Unverified.text: You haven’t verified your account yet. Please complete verification process to invest in startups and access other features for investors.
Waitlist.form.title: Join Waitlist
Waitlist.form.message: To ensure that you’re one of the first in line to invest in <0>{ startupName }</0>, join the waitlist by submitting the form below.
Waitlist.form.amount.title: Intended investment amount
Waitlist.form.amount.note: Please choose the amount you are planning to invest in { startupName }. You can change it at any time when the startup starts to haggle.
Waitlist.form.amount.label: Amount
Waitlist.form.email.title: Email for Notifications
Waitlist.form.email.note: Please make sure that the email address below is the one you are willing to receive notifications to.
Waitlist.form.email.label: Email
Waitlist.form.error.default: Oops, something went wrong. Please reload the page or try again later.
Waitlist.success.text: You have successfully joined the waitlist for { startupName }. Once the deal is open we will notify you via email.
Waitlist.success.title: You Are on the Waitlist
